All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionLog
The ActionLog class represents a log of an action performed by a user in the system.
ActionLogs
The ActionLogs class represents a JFrame window that displays all actions of either ADMIN or employee.
AddComplaint
The ComplaintsPage class represents a JFrame window for adding complaints.
AddExpense
The AddExpense class represents a JFrame window for adding expenses.
AddPayments
The AddPayments class represent a JFrame that displays fields and buttons for adding payments
AddRoom
The AddRoom class represent a JFrame the displays field and buttons for adding a room
AddTenant
The AddTenant class represent a JFrame the displays field and buttons for adding a tenant
AddUser
The AddUser Class represents a JFrame that shows fields and buttons for adding a user
AdminActionLog
Represents an action log of an administrator.
AdminHome
The AdminHome class represents a JFrame window that displays the homepage of the administrator.
AdminLoginLogs
The AdminLoginLogs class is a subclass of LoginLogs that represents login logs made by an admin user.
AdminLogs
The AdminLogs class provides methods to interact with the admin_action_log and admin_login_log tables in the database.
Complaint
A Complaint class that represents a complaint submitted by a user regarding a room issue.
Complaint.Status
An enum representing the status of a Complaint object.
ComplaintsDAO
This class represents a data access object for the Complaints table in the database.
ComplaintsPage
The ComplaintsPage class represents a JFrame window that displays unresolved complaints.
Connect
The Connect class is responsible for establishing a connection to the database and closing it when the application terminates.
EditComplaint
The EditComplaint class provides functionality to edit an existing complaint in the system.
EditExpense
The EditExpense class represents a JFrame window for Editing expenses.
EditRoom
The EditRoomt class represent a JFrame the displays field and buttons editing rooms
EditUser
The EditUser Class represents a JFrame that shows fields and buttons for editing a user
EmployeeActionLog
The EmployeeActionLog class represents the action log of an employee.
EmployeeHome
The EmployeeHome class represents a JFrame window that displays the homepage of the Employees
EmployeeLoginLogs
The EmployeeLoginLogs class extends the LoginLogs class and represents the login logs of an employee.
EmployeeLogs
Provides methods to create and retrieve employee action logs and employee login logs from the database.
Expense
The Expense class represents an expense made by a user.
ExpenseDAO
This class represents a data access object (DAO) for the Expense model, which provides methods for CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) on expenses in the database.
ExpensesPage
The ExpensesPage class represents a JFrame window that displays the expenses.
Gender
An enum representing the gender of a person.
LoginLogs
The LoginLogs class represents login logs of users.
LoginPage
LoginPage represents a JFrame that display a login page
LogType
The `LogType` enumeration specifies the type of user login/logout activity.
Payment
The Payment class represents a payment made for a rental by a tenant to an employee..
PaymentPage
The PaymentPage class represents a JFrame that shows the payments made and other additional functinos
Payments
This class handles database operations related to payments.
Rental
A class representing a rental agreement between a tenant and a landlord for a room.
RentalDAO
A class that provides methods to interact with the rentals table in the database.
Room
The Room class represents a room with its attributes such as ID, room number, price, and description.
RoomCheck
The RoomCheck is a JFrame that displays the GUI for the checking the rooms availability
RoomDAO
This class provides data access to the rooms table in the database.
Roomease
The Roomease class is the entry point for the application.
RoomsPage
The RoomsPage represents a JFrame that displays all the rooms and some buttons for CRUD operations
Session
The Session class represents the session of a user who has logged into the system.
Tenant
Represents a tenant in the system.
TenantDAO
The TenantDAO class provides methods to interact with the tenant table in the database.
User
Represents a user of the system.
UserDAO
This class represents a Data Access Object (DAO) for the User entity.
UsersPage
The UsersPage Class represents a JFrame that show Tables and buttons for CRUD operations on users
UserType
Enum class representing the different types of users that can exist in the system.
WindowCloseHandler
Provides a utility class for handling the closing of a JFrame.
